biotools.summary: Curated open-access search database of Peruvian plant metabolites reported in various collections. PERUNPDB is the first version of a collection of more than 200 compounds of Peruvian origin where 95% of the compounds come from plants and 5% from animals.

bioschemas.name: PeruNPDB
bioschemas.summary: Curated open-access search database of Peruvian plant metabolites reported in various collections. PERUNPDB is the first version of a collection of more than 200 compounds of Peruvian origin where 95% of the compounds come from plants and 5% from animals.
